p: Amaranth oil was purchased from Behave Company (Rietberg, Germany), and MG was obtained from Minoo Chocolate Factory (Tehran, Iran). Fatty acid composition of amaranth oil and MG, based on gas chromatography analysis, consisted of about 80% unsaturated and 90% saturated glycerides, respectively. Moreover, both oil and MG were maintained at –24°C until further analysis.
